Format percentage

Source: R/fmt.R
fmt_pct.Rd

Format percentage

Usage

fmt_pct(x, digits = 1, pre = "(", post = ")")

Arguments

x

A numeric vector.

digits

Number of digits.

pre

Text before the number.

post

Text after the number.

Value

A numeric vector with the expected format.

Examples

fmt_pct(c(1, 1.52, 0.3, 100))
#> [1] "  (1.0)" "  (1.5)" "  (0.3)" "(100.0)"
